name: AULA F75 Mechanical Keyboard 2.4G Wireless
description: High-quality mechanical keyboard with 2.4G wireless connection, with Cherry MX switches for optimal typing experience. Features RGB backlight, programmable keys, and long battery life.

name: S-Series Comfort Chair Ergonomic Luxury
description: Ergonomic office chair designed for maximum comfort during long work sessions. Features adjustable height, lumbar support, and premium fabric upholstery.

name: Wireless headphones Pods Pro 2
description: Premium wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation, spatial audio, and up to 6 hours of battery life. Water and sweat resistant for workouts.

name: Laptop Bag 13.3 15.6 14 INCH Waterproof Notebook
description: Waterproof laptop bag compatible with various laptop sizes. Features multiple compartments, shoulder strap, and reinforced padding for protection.

name: Step Drill Bit HSS Straight Groove Titanium
description: High-speed steel step drill bits with titanium coating for longer life. Perfect for drilling in metal, plastic, and wood.

name: Fast Charging Power Bank 10000mAh
description: Portable power bank with 10000mAh capacity and fast charging capabilities. Compatible with most smartphones and small electronic devices.

name: Professional Soccer Cleats
description: Professional-grade soccer cleats with superior grip and comfort. Designed for performance on both natural and artificial turf.

name: Professional Blender 1000W
description: Powerful 1000W blender with multiple speed settings and a large capacity jar. Perfect for smoothies, soups, and more.

name: SanDisk Ultra Memory Card 100MB/s
description: High-speed memory card with 100MB/s transfer speed. Available in various capacities for your storage needs.

name: Razer Gaming Mouse
description: High-performance gaming mouse with customizable RGB lighting and programmable buttons. Features precise optical sensor for accurate tracking.

name: Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo
description: Wireless keyboard and mouse combo for a clutter-free desk setup. Features low-profile keys and comfortable mouse design.

name: DSLR Camera with 18-55mm Lens
description: Digital SLR camera with 18-55mm lens for capturing high-quality photos and videos. Features multiple shooting modes and built-in flash.

name: 13.3-inch Laptop Sleeve
description: Protective sleeve for 13.3-inch laptops. Features water-resistant material and padded interior for maximum protection.

name: Running Shoes
description: Comfortable running shoes with cushioned insole and breathable upper. Perfect for jogging, running, and casual wear.

name: 24-inch Monitor Full HD
description: 24-inch Full HD monitor with IPS panel for vibrant colors and wide viewing angles. Features multiple connectivity options.
